casebody.head_matter:
490 A.2d 832
Robert DOLENTE and Kathleen Dolente, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund and Thomas J. Judge, Sr., Director.
